overview: Laney Grey tells her boyfriend Will that he needs to stand up to his co-worker, Nathan Bronson, who is bullying him. He says that his stepmom (Cory Chase) says the same thing. Just when things are about to hear up between Lacey and Will Pounder, Nathan barges into the house and lies, he says that he was invited. Nathan bullies Will in front of his girlfriend and the humiliated and angry pair storm off just as Cory shows up. They start talking and get into he and Will's relationship and her dissatisfaction with her marriage. Nathan has a secret to hold over Cory, and she is compelled to reveal her topless body and the seduction truly begins. What can you say, crazy things happen when The Bully Meets My StepMom.
title: The Bully Meets My Mom
